The influence of the Holy Spirit is the life of Christ in the soul. We do not see Christ and speak to Him, but His Holy Spirit is just as near us in one place as in another. He works in and through every one who receives Christ. Those who know the indwelling of the Spirit reveal the fruits of the Spirit--love, joy, peace, long-suffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.-- Ms. 41, 1897, pp. 7-11. ("Words of Comfort"). 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 31, 1983
